CmdLine: apk add --no-cache -U       ca-certificates       build-base       libxml2       libxml2-dev       libxslt       libxslt-dev       make       python-dev       py-pip       python     && pip install --upgrade pip setuptools
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: pip install -r /cabby/requirements.txt   && cd /cabby   && python setup.py install
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apk del build-base       libxml2-dev       libxslt-dev       python-dev       build-base     && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*      && rm -r /root/.cache     && rm -f requirements.txt     && rm -rf /cabby
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: {   echo '#!/bin/sh';        echo 'echo "';        echo ' Commands to be run:';        echo '      taxii-discovery ';        echo '      taxii-poll';        echo '      taxii-collections';        echo '      taxii-push ';        echo '      taxii-subscription';        echo '      taxii-proxy';        echo '';        echo 'e.g. docker run -ti eclecticiq/cabby taxii-discovery --path https://test.taxiistand.com/read-write/services/discovery';        echo '';        echo 'More information available at: http://cabby.readthedocs.org';        echo 'Or you can choose to drop back into a shell by providing: bash as the command:';        echo '';        echo 'docker run -ti cabby bash"'; }  > /help.sh  && chmod 750 /help.sh
Commands.Name: run
